prompt_base: cinematic photograph of a sinister elderly scientist, long white hair, thick grey mustache, cybernetic brain enhancements, glowing yellow eyes, Red Ribbon logo on hat, determined expression, 8k realistic photo
feature_prompt: extremely wrinkled skin, age spots, visible veins, realistic metallic hand texture, visible braincase behind glass, detailed fabric on hat, sharp focus
negative_prompt: anime, cartoon, plastic skin, smooth skin, doll, youthful, flat lighting, blurry, organic hand, human hand, no hat, no red ribbon logo, too soft, happy expression
